body.h2: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
body.p: Welcome to the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the Technological University of Foobar. You have come to the right place if you want to be a computer scientist, an IT engineer, or, if we may use some of the titles that are more common on the job market: a systems analyst, an application developer, a software programmer, a system administrator, a hardware engineer, a network specialist...
But first things first: let's take a look at the study programs that are offered by our department:

ul.li: Bachelor of Information and Communication Technology
Master of Information and Communication Technology

body.p: You can visit the course catalog online at http://code.google.com/p/purepdf/ or order our DVD-Rom at this address:

blockquote.p: Department of Computer Science and Engineering

body.p: Our faculty also has a reputation for excellent research. For more info please visit the websites of our departments:

li.a: Faculty of Software Engineering and Applied Computer Science
Faculty of Information and Communication Technology

body.p: The Department of Information Technology is the youngest department at our University. It emerged from the department of Engineering and the department of Science.
